meanings.definition: The surgical cutting or severing of the vas deferens, typically as a means of sterilization in males.
meanings.sent1: After the vasotomies, the male cat could no longer father kittens.
meanings.sent2: The doctor performed vasotomies to prevent future pregnancies.
meanings.sent3: The vasotomies turned the bachelor into a permanent bachelor!
meanings.sent4: His decision to undergo vasotomies was like cutting off the road to fatherhood.
meanings.sent5: The vasotomies were the final snip in his journey to being child-free.
